history.proof: intros p q H. destruct H as [H1 | H2]. - destruct H1 as [H1 H2]. sauto q: on depth: 3. - destruct H2 as [H1 H2]. sauto q: on depth: 3.

exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros p q H. destruct H as [H1 | H2]. - destruct H1 as [H1 H2]. split. + apply Zeven_mult. * apply Zeven_mult; auto. + apply Zodd_mult. * apply Zodd_mult; auto. - destruct H2 as [H1 H2]. split. + apply Zodd_mult. * apply Zeven_mult; auto. + apply Zeven_mult. * apply Zodd_mult; auto.
